setup()

Source: show 

# File test/tc_gdata_client_photos.rb, line 22
  def setup
    @gp = GData::Client::Photos.new
    @gp.source = 'Ruby Client Unit Tests'
    @gp.clientlogin(self.get_username(), self.get_password())
  end
test_authenticated_dropbox_feed()

Source: show 

# File test/tc_gdata_client_photos.rb, line 28
  def test_authenticated_dropbox_feed
    feed = @gp.get('http://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/api/user/default/albumid/default?max-results=1').to_xml
    self.assert_not_nil(feed, 'feed can not be nil')
  end
test_photo_upload()

Source: show 

# File test/tc_gdata_client_photos.rb, line 33
  def test_photo_upload
    test_image = File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), 'testimage.jpg')
    mime_type = 'image/jpeg'
    
    response = @gp.post_file('http://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/api/user/default/albumid/default', 
      test_image, mime_type).to_xml
    
    edit_uri = response.elements["link[@rel='edit']"].attributes['href']
    
    @gp.delete(edit_uri)
  end
test_photo_upload_with_metadata()

Source: show 

# File test/tc_gdata_client_photos.rb, line 45
  def test_photo_upload_with_metadata
    test_image = File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), 'testimage.jpg')
    mime_type = 'image/jpeg'
    
    entry = "<entry xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom'>\n<title>ruby-client-testing.jpg</title>\n<summary>Test case for Ruby Client Library.</summary>\n<category scheme=\"http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#kind\"\nterm=\"http://schemas.google.com/photos/2007#photo\"/>\n</entry>\n"
    
    response = @gp.post_file('http://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/api/user/default/albumid/default', 
      test_image, mime_type, entry).to_xml
    
    edit_uri = response.elements["link[@rel='edit']"].attributes['href']
    
    @gp.delete(edit_uri)
  end
